definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
hibiscus/cotton rose (Hibiscus mutabilis)/lotus/foo yung (Chinese dish similar to an omelet)
Furong district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan/Seremban, capital of Sembilan state 森美蘭|森美兰[Sen1 mei3 lan2], Malaysia
hibiscus/cotton rose (Hibiscus mutabilis)/lotus/foo yung (Chinese dish similar to an omelet)
Furong district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan/Seremban, capital of Sembilan state 森美蘭|森美兰[Sen1 mei3 lan2], Malaysia

as a lotus flower breaking the surface (idiom); surpassingly beautiful (of young lady's face or old gentleman's calligraphy)
lit. lotus rises from the water (idiom); fig. to blossom (of poem or art)

Russian cruiser Aurora, firing the shot signaling the 1917 revolution, a favorite of communist iconography

sentences.english: Their advisers scheduled the meeting soon after Rousseff won the presidential elections.
sentences.chinese: 就在罗赛芙获选后不久，双方顾问就安排了会晤。

sentences.english: Crofts New Hall is an amazing concept.
sentences.chinese: 克萝芙新庄园是个了不起的概念。

sentences.english: He worked to create an environment where she could pursue her writing.
sentences.chinese: 努力经营出版社，好让吴尔芙可以尽心写作。

sentences.english: Spread cloud, QinQu fingertip condensate, water are off the hubbub.
sentences.chinese: 广袖流云，琴曲指尖凝，清水芙蕖脱尘嚣。

sentences.english: Liv is a shopping addict, she said that herself.
sentences.chinese: 丽芙是一个购物迷，她自己那么说。

sentences.english: But let me tell you what we are doing in Herbalife.
sentences.chinese: 但让我告诉你我们贺宝芙是在做什么。

sentences.english: Elfloving creations of stunning elegance and captivating originality.
sentences.chinese: 伊芙洛林的作品兼具极致典雅与迷人创意。

sentences.english: St Ives Collagen and Elastin Moisturizer is the best!
sentences.chinese: 圣艾芙胶原弹性蛋白特效护肤露是最好的。

sentences.english: I'm gonna join a package tour to banff Canada.
sentences.chinese: 我要去参加一个旅行团去加拿大班芙公园。

sentences.english: Fans loved Duff's clean cut, teen-friendly image.
sentences.chinese: 歌迷们喜欢达芙清新健康的亲和形象。

sentences.english: Where did Josie read about Eve and Black Eye Li?
sentences.chinese: 乔西在哪里读到伊芙和李黑眼的事？

sentences.english: It's Puff the Jewish Dragon's favorite kosher dish.
sentences.chinese: 这是犹太龙泡芙最喜欢的犹太传统食品。

sentences.english: In many ways, Leonard was Woolf's caretaker.
sentences.chinese: 从许多方面说来，他都是吴尔芙的呵护者。

sentences.english: Johnson Sirleaf promised Monday to unite her people.
sentences.chinese: 瑟丽芙在星期一承诺要联合全国的人民。

sentences.english: Pretty soon Jennifer is being stalked by the mysterious killer.
sentences.chinese: 很快，珍妮芙被追杀的神秘杀手。

sentences.english: The caster goes to river and makes a deal with a Naiad .
sentences.chinese: 施法者进入河流，与一位宁芙完成协定。

definition: (phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
used in the transliteration of people's names
